Package board

Class CheckBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • board.CheckBoard
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ChceckBoard100
    public class CheckBoard
extends java.lang.Object
    Class with standard 8x8 board functionality

      • move

        public void move​(int from,
                 int to)
        Moves the selected square to the selected position, takes pieces in the way and promotes a piece if can be promoted. Invalid moves are taken care of in another function.
        Parameters:
        from - Position to move
        to - Position where to move

      • possibleMoves

        public java.lang.String[] possibleMoves​(int man,
                                        int player)
        Returns an array of possible moves given a starting position.
        Parameters:
        man - The starting position
        player - The current player, 1 - Whites, 2 - Blacks.
        Returns:
        String[]

      • possibleKingMoves

        private void possibleKingMoves​(int player,
                               int position,
                               java.util.List<java.lang.String> ret)
        Returns an array of possible move for a given position given that the piece is a King
        Parameters:
        player - The current player, 1 - Whites, 2 - Blacks.
        position - The starting position
        ret - The list where to add the possible positions

      • validMan

        public boolean validMan​(int player,
                        int man)
        Checks if the selected Man on the board is movable by the current player.
        Parameters:
        player - The current player, 1 - Whites, 2 - Blacks.
        man - The selected starting position.
        Returns:
        boolean

      • validMove

        public boolean validMove​(int player,
                         int move,
                         java.lang.String[] moves)
        Checks if the selected move is valid, that is contained in the possible moves array.
        Parameters:
        player - The current player, 1 - Whites, 2 - Blacks.
        move - The selected move to be validated.
        moves - The array containing the possible moves.
        Returns:
        boolean

      • combo

        private void combo​(int pos,
                   int player,
                   java.util.List<java.lang.String> list)
        Function that calculates the route where to take the most opposing Mans
        Parameters:
        pos - The position to start checking
        list - The list to add the maximum taken final position
        player - The current player, 1 - Whites, 2 - Blacks.

      • comboCount

        private void comboCount​(int player,
                        int pos,
                        java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> jumped,
                        java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> steps,
                        java.util.List<java.lang.Integer[]> ways,
                        java.util.List<java.lang.Integer[]> enemies)
        Helping function to calculate the higher amount of taken opposing Mans
        Parameters:
        player - The current player, 1 - Whites, 2 - Blacks.
        pos - The position where to calculate possible ways from
        jumped - The list of jumped pieces.
        steps - The list of steps made.
        ways - The list of possible ways.
        enemies - The list of enemies taken by each possible way.

      • comboCountK

        private void comboCountK​(int player,

                         java.util.List<java.lang.Integer[]> ways,
                         java.util.List<java.lang.Integer[]> enemies)

        Parameters:
        player - The current player, 1 - Whites, 2 - Blacks.
        position - The position where to calculate possible ways from
        jumped - The list of jumped pieces.
        steps - The list of steps made.
        ways - The list of possible ways.
        enemies - The list of enemies taken by each possible way.
